Service Details: Hosted by the Canadian Mental Health Association Kelowna, Foundry Kelowna unites 25 partner organizations that will address the health care needs of youth ages 12 to 24 and their families.- Mental Health Services (Walk-In counselling)- Primary care (Physicians, access to sexual health counselling)- Substance use programs (Education, counselling and referral)- Youth and family navigation and peer support (support groups, educational events)- Social services (housing, income assistance, employment support and emergency food closet)- Walk-in Medical Clinic (select hours)
Hours: Mon-Fri: 9:00am - 5:00pmDrop-in Counselling: Mon-Fri:  2:00pm - 5:00pmWalk-in Clinic: Mon,Tue,Thu: 1:00pm - 5:00pm; Fri: 9:00am - noon.
